name: TableCell
description: Represents a cell in a OneNote table.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the cell.

properties.name: parentTable
properties.description: Gets the parent table of the cell.

properties.name: parentRow
properties.description: Gets the parent row of the cell.

properties.name: rowIndex
properties.description: Gets the index of the cell's row in the table.

properties.name: cellIndex
properties.description: Gets the index of the cell in its row.

properties.name: paragraphs
properties.description: Gets the collection of Paragraph objects in the TableCell.

methods.name: appendHtml
methods.description: Adds the specified HTML to the bottom of the TableCell.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: The HTML string to append. See [supported HTML](../../docs/onenote/onenote-add-ins-page-content.md#supported-html) for the OneNote add-ins JavaScript API.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
